root.name: Rigid registration
root.description: A simple tool for rigid registration of chromatic or temporal shifts, based on the Fast Fourier and Log-Polar transforms
root.author: agaspard - Pasteur
root.changelog:
- Version 1.0.8.0 Date 2017-02-24 14:35:22
Fixed an issue with the advanced mode where negative rotations were not corrected
- Version 1.0.7.0 Date 2017-02-23 17:39:36
Fixed an issue with the advanced chromatic registration causing the wrong sequence to be registered
- Version 1.0.6.0 Date 2016-12-11 16:02:17
Added a stop button to halt a running process
- Version 1.0.5.0 Date 2016-11-07 17:43:52
Fixed an issue causing applyRotation2D(...) and applyTranslation2D(...) not to work on single image sequences
- Version 1.0.4.0 Date 2016-01-04 17:32:28
Some fixes to the temporal registration not behaving properly
- Version 1.0.3.0 Date 2015-11-09 14:43:30
Fixed a minor issue with the Z selector in the graphical interface
- Version 1.0.2.0 Date 2015-07-10 14:34:51
Fixed the class path (again)
- Version 1.0.1.0 Date 2015-07-10 14:32:50
Fixed the class path
- Version 1.0.0.0 Date 2015-07-06 03:05:44
Apply a 3-step registration (translation + rotation + translation) for optimal results
- Version 0.0.2.0 Date 2015-07-03 11:32:42
Fixed an issue with the advanced mode
- Version 0.0.1.0 Date 2015-06-26 16:43:43
